website_summaries.verdict: A safe, stable wax warmer that can accommodate a large quantity of wax.
pros: Cools down quickly after being shut off
cons: It takes longer than some of the others to heat up

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: So, I have never waxed at home before, but I finally decided it was high time I try my hand at it. I used this with the Cerepil Blue wax (14.11 oz tin) since I saw a lot of people say how well it fits right into this wax warmer. It has been easy to use, but I would recommend to completely unplug this item when you are done. The knob on the front slides quite easily, so it would be easy to accidentally turn it back on (especially if you have kids or pets.) It seems to heat up pretty fast. This has been a good experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandrea A. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! I literally just got this product and it’s already malfunctioning! I followed the instructions and waited for it to heat up for about 30 minutes while I ate and came back and the green light was flickering and the wax was still completely hard! Tried changing plugs and adjusting the setting still 2 hours later the wax is still trying to melt. Read the return policy and it said it’s not eligible for return 😡 SOMEBODY GIVING ME MY MONEY BACK!
customer_reviews.author: Dajah

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend for first time users
customer_reviews.text: I saw this in one my cousins home , she did this so easily ..so I bought this ,but Freaked out even before doing this on my arms as this is my first time at home ...I don’t know if I did something wrong beacuase that left a rash on my arm ...pained a lot literally a lot lot lot ...scared of doing on other arm ...but some how I did that, leaving rash on my other hand too..and ya the biggest flaw is that wax took almost 50minutes to melt and that too on High temperature...FYI I used Gigi warmer with Gigi wax and strips ..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Takes about 20 to 30 minutes to get to desired temperature with the Full can of Hard wax Then you can adjust temp so you don't burn yourself. I use the blue cirepil wax for whole body, lasts awhile and coconut oil to remove residue easily and leave silky smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy1985

customer_reviews.title: Be optimistic about this entire system!
customer_reviews.text: Has been working well for the past couple of months with the GiGi waxes, but I have not tried any others in it ( probably won’t in the future either). A full Brazilian and anal wax was going to cost me $125 plus tip, so this was my $$$ saving alternative. It has turned out to work just fine, despite not being able to wax the more sensitive areas myself (if you are comfortable let someone do it for you!😂).
customer_reviews.author: Keeyhla

customer_reviews.title: Stuck between 3-4 stars
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Melted wax nice and fast Semi pro/con: One temp only and it’s really hot(not too much of a problem since i usually melted my wax all the way and then turned the machine off, as you had a good 10 mins before the wax hardens up to a point where you need to turn it back on again) Con: Lid was flimsy and pretty much just sat on the top as a cover. *Over all, if it actually came with a canister for the wax I would’ve rebought it when it was time to replace my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Small and Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a beginning waxer, like myself, that's only looking to wax themselves. I love this. It's super easy to use and very self explanatory - and that's coming from someone who had no idea what they were doing when they started waxing.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi {SincerelyCandid}

customer_reviews.title: Too hot
customer_reviews.text: Even on low, with a full tin of wax, it gets way too hot. I have to cycle back and forth between low and off to keep the right consistency. Such a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: TenaciousB

customer_reviews.title: Temp controls are off
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent unit for the price. One of those "you get what you pay for". The ease of clean is a little annoying tbh but as long as you aren't super messy, it shouldn't be difficult. The thing that's most annoying and took me awhile to figure out is that the spot for the temperature controls (Low,Medium,High) is off center. You can see in the pic. So Low, for example is much further to the left and not actually ON the L. Same with M and H. Which can lead to easily burning yourself of you dont know what your wax is supposed to look like when heated properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to waxing and turned to my friend for hard wax advice. She said she bought a GiGi wax kit years ago and it was still going strong and did the job in warming the wax. This cord is long and durable. The temperature controls do their job although I wouldn't recommend it on High unless you're just starting it off there for a few minutes and turning it down to Low right after. I bought a wax tin can to keep the wax in and avoid creating a mess in the kit. So far so good! The base is a cheap plastic but so far so good it hasn't melted to malfunctioned!
customer_reviews.author: Yessi

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I get this sooner!?!?
customer_reviews.text: I just tried this got the first time and am in love! I have been using the microwave one for years thinking I didn’t need a home waxer. I was so wrong! The consistency of it staying a temperature the whole time, instead of starting to cool as soon as it’s out of the microwave makes a world of difference! I have no idea how much I’ve spent on eyebrow waxing over the years bc I couldn’t do it with the microwave wax, only to come home and tweeze bc they can never see the hair once they clean the brow pencil off. I JUST DID MY OWN EYEBROWS!!! FYI I used the hard wax and am in love!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. It should come with a tin can, but I bought one and so far so good. It warms up the hard wax in about 10 minutes. We are using the hard wax beans, so it is quicker than others have said. It takes a little bit of adjusting the heat up and down depending on the wax. You have to guess and check if it's good. It takes practice like with anything. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Costing

customer_reviews.title: Do not suggest
customer_reviews.text: I've had this was pot for 7 months now. I wax about once a month. It's already stopped working. It will heat for about 5 mins then stop and cool before the wax is even melted. The green light will display that it is ready and the wax is still hard. I'm so disappointed because it worked so well when it did work.
customer_reviews.author: OWSWV

customer_reviews.title: Better Than European Wax Center
customer_reviews.text: I had heard that European uses this same device, but either way I'm happier I have this as home. For the past two years I have been getting my waxing services done at a local European, but was dreading the costs. I wanted to try at home waxing. I figured if I couldn't succeed at home with this then at least I can say I only spent about $30 on this device. This is a lightweight device and warms the wax in about 20 minutes to a half hour. At that point you can begin to wax yourself. I have had nothing but great and easy to obtain results with the machine in conjunction with the blue ceripil wax.
customer_reviews.author: Oona Belich

customer_reviews.title: don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived yesterday. Went to take it out of the box and it's already broken. Disappointed and it says not eligible for returns. Complete BS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wax warmer. I bought two so far and i love the way it warms up any kind of wax. It has easy to use warm up levels where its not too hot to use or too cold for the wax to spread nicely on your skin. Easy to use. However my only concern is cleaning up the machine after use. I noticed using alcohol swabs or even post wax cream usually helps get rid of wax drips on machine. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Samersaadi

customer_reviews.title: Took my can 2 hours to melt
customer_reviews.text: Took my 14 oz wax can to melt in 2 hours on the highest setting. I don't know if thats normal considering the directions said it should take 20 - 30 minutes. Directions are also vague so I had to do some googling.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Rex

customer_reviews.title: Had this from 6 months and I find the temp ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this from 6 months and I find the temp control is irregular. The same setting can either be blazing hot or too cold. Continue to test temp even during same time of use. I have had a couple of unfortunate surprises.
customer_reviews.author: Ambre P

customer_reviews.title: I am a proficient at-home waxer and this thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Just replaced my first one of these after 5 years, and only because I had gotten wax all over it and it was grody looking. Definitely get the wax collars to keep things tidy. I am a proficient at-home waxer and this thing is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Eden

customer_reviews.title: Dont tip over wax in box...
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love ours. We used to have another one and recently bought this as a replacement. It works perfect. Downside? Cleaning! Pro tip: generally, you can get little circular cardboard cutouts that go between this and the wax. I highly recommend this. And always always always make sure your wax is covered completely before putting back in the cabinet. <.< because if wax leaks out all over the machine and into the box, at that point, you might as well cut your losses and buy and new one.
customer_reviews.author: Kat R.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this product. I took one star away for two reasons: 1) it took one hour to melt half a can of Cirepil wax 2) I had to alternate between turning the warmer off and switching it back on to the low setting because I felt it was getting to hot when on low, but I did not want it to get to warm. All in all, this product is worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Not able to use with Wax
customer_reviews.text: The site claims that this can be used with Cirepil Wax Beads. I do not see how that is possible. I have attempted to contact the seller and am not able to. I have not used the machine and am not able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Douza

customer_reviews.title: Best wax warmer around
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I owned. First one was still good, just an unfortunate accident where it was left on its side and the wax was covering the whole thing. Anywho I loved it so much I had to find the same one and I did and I’m still not disappointed. Would recommend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is crap, nothing comes with it. No wax and no applicators. Pretty cheap of them. I won't ever but another from them and I will highly recommend ppl not to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Denise Graven

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love my wax warmer. I accidentally left it on with hardwax inside for 1 entire week, but everything was ok no fires! btw, use hardwax and don't touch the honee wax anymore because you get little to no sticky residue!
customer_reviews.author: Steen

customer_reviews.title: Gets Hot & Great for Bottle Sealing Wax
customer_reviews.text: After another 275 degree unit was no longer available I went on the hunt! And after scouring tons of wax warmer reviews the Gigi seemed to work great for what i wanted - melting bottle sealing wax beads to seal my flip top beverage bottles! This little thing packs heating power. works fast and gets the job done. I suppose it would be great for body wax as well.
customer_reviews.author: DA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy from here. Waist of money. I had bought two for the salon. We used one it didn’t not heat up the wax. Thought ok this one came out defective. I connected the second one that I bought from here and again it was defective didn’t work. Just money thrown down the drain. Just go to Sally’s beauty supply buy the same and it will work with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Nilda Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Great wax pot
customer_reviews.text: I have used this warmer three or four times now & its been amazing every time! It does take a time or two to better figure out the heat settings. I would prefer if they were numbers instead of just high low & medium but that’s just splitting hairs. I use this with ceripil blue wax & have no issues what’s so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kasie

customer_reviews.title: I’ve never had the too hot issue
customer_reviews.text: I love this wax warmer I know a lot of people had issues with the temperature always being too hot but it’s perfect for me. We’ve been using it for 9 months and no issue. I love that I can control the temperature better than on and off, super easy to use. I will say getting inside the pot to clean is a bit tricky and take some elbow grease, a waxing stick, and a fair amount of goo off but afterwards it looks perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable!
customer_reviews.text: The top of the warmer arrived broken. Tried to return to replace it but this item isn’t returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Ann G

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Design
customer_reviews.text: This wax kit has a terrible design. When you heat up the wax, the wax overflows and it's a huge mess. I feel like throwing this away entirely but I paid a lot for it. I seriously put foil all around the paper circle around the wax just so the wax doesn't overflow. Also, the lid is hard to grasp especially when there's wax all over the rim. There should be something that you could wrap your finger around. Good wax but terrible, terrible design.
customer_reviews.author: AlohaB

customer_reviews.title: Too hot
customer_reviews.text: The instructions for the gigi wax is to put it up too high for an hour then bring it back to low. But mine just stays super hot so the wax stays super hot and thin. So I burn my self and don't get enough wax in the area to pull it off. So I use non woven strips. Which helps with the thin wax but not with the burning. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Works but not returnable
customer_reviews.text: It works. Heats quickly. Only comes with one paper guard though. But BEWARE! Because this item cannot be returned! It states this on item page, however, unless you carefully read every line you may miss it, as I did. It is below the product maker info, not with the price and delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HEAT
customer_reviews.text: I had product less than a month, it just stopped working and I threw the box away. I am so mad! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY! OR AT LEAST KEEP THE BOX
customer_reviews.author: melody gaines

customer_reviews.title: Citrelle
customer_reviews.text: I love this! My first warmer but love it! I can warm it up and come in and out of the bathroom throughout the day... I don’t like sitting and doing it all at once. I have too much going on! Works perfect and I love the citrelle
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my job as a nails technician and beautician, and it works very well. I have one at home also for personal use. I wax all the time. I wax my eyebrows, legs, arms, face, private areas, everything. It warms up your wax very quickly and keeps it at a warm enough temperature. I would recommend this for anyone who needs to do quick waxing.
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: Great little wax pot
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this wax pot as a replacement for a different brand. The temperature slider is easy to use. The one drawback is that the lid does not firmly secure in place if you are leaving this unattended especially with small children and/or pets. I do not have children and am not concerned about my pets disturbing the wax pot so this is perfect for me! I love the small size and that it comes with a clean collar included to minimize any mess (you can buy extra separately).
customer_reviews.author: Marissaaah

customer_reviews.title: Dud
customer_reviews.text: No apparent exterior damage but it's warmer did not work at all had it on all different temperatures for several hours even on high - Took the wax out and put my hand in the warmer and it was not warm or hot and I had it on the highest setting
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: Feels a little cheap but works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one as a gift and one for myself. This wax warmer works great but can get a little messy if not used properly. That's probably the case with most wax warmers. I like that the cover doesn't touch the edges of the warmer so it always stays clean. I also like the settings which allow me to heat up the wax on high initially and then turn it to low so I don't burn myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It arrived with a broken lid.
customer_reviews.text: The top was broken when I removed It from the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a kit, as it is listed, it is just a warmer!
customer_reviews.text: This is listed as a KIT but it is apparently just the wax warmer, not a kit at all, since no wax, strips or sticks came with the "kit". Very misleading to call it a kit....
customer_reviews.author: Nicole D. Hanlin

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Was iffy about getting this since the reviews were all over the place, but I got it because I needed my cirepil hardwax to fit into a wax warmer...the ones I have were too small. This Gigi one is great and useful for at home waxing or job waxing.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: I received this in the mail today and was super excited to use it
customer_reviews.text: I received this in the mail today and was super excited to use it...only to be completely disappointed as I had it plugged in on high for 45 min and the wax was barley melted. I've melted wax faster on an $8.00 coffee cup warmer than this hunk of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Heating time varies per wax
customer_reviews.text: It took far longer to heat up than the instructions said. (I’m guessing as it wasn’t Gigi wax I used) I’d used the blue tin of ceripil stuff. It took just over an hour for it to fully melt the tin and then we turned down to Medium. I think that was actually a little cool and will prob try just over m next time. Other than that can’t fault it.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Wickson

customer_reviews.title: Intuitive design
customer_reviews.text: This worked well for heating the wax. I didn't realize that it didn't come with a spare removable tin to heat wax pellets that don't come in a melting tin. But I guess most of the GiGi waxes come in their own container. You then place them into the wax warmer, wait about 30 minutes (which is enough time to take a shower so you're waxing clean surfaces), drink some wine, and have at it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the shot
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a huge GiGi fan. So I decided to pay a little extra more and get something that I’m very familiar with. The only downfall about this product is the lever that controls the heat. I don’t see a difference in the temperature when I adjust it to Low. It seems to stay the same for me. Not sure why, maybe the lever is broken! Overall it’s easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Elena Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t turn on
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work. It never turned on. I’m guessing I got a defective product but when I tried returning it or getting a replacement Amazon didn’t give me the option.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was atrocious! Star rating for packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was horrible. It made me wonder if the product inside was damaged. It looks ok but we’ll see once I go to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Christa

customer_reviews.title: Good waxing machine!
customer_reviews.text: I've always loyally used Gigi's multi-purpose wax warmer, and never had any issues with it (Been waxing for over 7 years)! Easy to use with available multiple warming settings!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Le

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and cannot return it.
customer_reviews.text: At first I put 5 stars because the product arrived so quickly. Then I realized my warmer arrived broken. When I wanted to return it or exchange they said to returns. I am not happy because it arrived broken!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Weddington

customer_reviews.title: stopped working suddenly
customer_reviews.text: All of a sudden it stopped working. Tried to change the heat modes. did not see any light. I do not recommend it since there is no long shelf life for the item.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya

customer_reviews.title: perfect for melting wax safely and efficiently
customer_reviews.text: First wax warmer ever, did the job impeccably.. Set hard wax to lowest setting NOT highest setting and wait and you will have perfect wax.. We tried the directions of highest setting then turning down and it was too hot for a while..
customer_reviews.author: Chuck and Mary Jones

customer_reviews.title: Temporarily great then dies out
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in October of 2019. This was a great purchase until about a month ago. Stopped heating up and now the wax pot inside and the warmer for in the trash. Didn’t expect it to die after 8 months!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I got a "wild hair" (pun intended) and decided to wax my legs. Mercy, I had no idea how bad that hurts! The wax warmer worked perfectly, but I'll probably set it aside and use to wax my eyebrows and upper lip.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota123

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my GiGi wax warmer kit for several years now and am very pleased with it. It is very easy to use and heats up relatively quickly. I don't put wax directly in the item, but have another insert I use to keep this one clean, so I don't know how easy the inside is to clean if you were to put the wax directly inside. I have been very happy with this item!
customer_reviews.author: Nk

customer_reviews.title: Consistently the same temperature!!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wax remover. I had one like this before that lasted for years and had to replace so I bought the same one. Love it. Heats wax perfectly and you can choose your temperature. It’s very consistent in temperature ! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jill Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Must have for at home use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Gigi wax warmer, plus I always purchase the Gigi wax and Gigi muslim rolls! It's so useful and easy to use! This is the 2nd time I've purchased this exact Gigi warmer, my other one worked fine but I accidentially spilled wax on it. I had my previous Gigi wax warmer for 5+ years and would use its 5-7x a year, and was still working; I just wanted a new one since I spilled wax on the old one. I would high recommend this for those that are comfortable self-waxing and prefer to have an salon grade product at home.
customer_reviews.author: Emmi Olson

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work. Does not heat enough to melt wax
customer_reviews.text: I've had the same wax warmer before and got this one to replace it because they aren't that easy to clean. This does not heat up the wax enough and it seems to stop heating after a few minutes regardless of the setting I put it in. Does not work! I threw my old one away and now I can't return this one because of their return policy. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Heats up relatively quick. I use it with the Cerepil wax.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it a few times, so far it works great. No issues. I gave 3 stars for cleaning since i haven’t had to clean it so idk if it’s easy or not
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Nice one.. great brand
customer_reviews.text: Love GiGi wax warmer ... I have been using this since 3 years now and It's great . Easy to use and operate . The only thing is that even after using collars some wax definitely falls on the warmer .. which is hard to clean and leaves dark patches and marks.. but it does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Siya

customer_reviews.title: Easy, great value
customer_reviews.text: I’m a beginner at waxing myself and took a chance on buying this wax warmer. Great price and easy to use. Been using for about 4 months now and haven’t had any issues with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can't use it as is
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that the product did not arrive with an empty can in which to put wax in. After enquiring about this through friends I ended up going back on line to order the empty can. The warmer should come with all necessary parts
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that is takes about an hour to fully heat and melt the wax to a usable state. That may be common, but I have to plan ahead when doing a wax session.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D. Faulk

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Heated up my tin of blue wax great. It has a low, medium and high setting. I turned it to high to get the wax completely melted then switched to medium until it was comfortably warm.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Good brand
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good except the packing. It was shipped in the Gigi originally box. The lid was cracked, the others were fine. Hopefully Amazon will be packing in their shipping boxes for more protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Khong

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one because I literally do not have the time to make an appointment at the salon to get a 5 min wax. This is so convenient! Heats up fairly quickly and allows you to adjust the heat so it’s not too hot! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: nicole l stein

customer_reviews.title: Savings are significant; Pays for itself
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can stay on top of my lip waxing without leaving the comfort of my home. This unit will pay for itself within a couple of months. Remember to always keep upright, because wax can ooze out in warm environments.
customer_reviews.author: Laura C.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is a godsent
customer_reviews.text: I save so much on waxing by having my own pot. Love this! And for those of you wondering which kind of wax to get, I just get the all purpose hunee (honey?) and use that for everything!
customer_reviews.author: Max E.

customer_reviews.title: Cord set on fire
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKED WELL UNTIL it randomly stop making contact with the power source and the light indicator off. The power cord set on FIRE today and almost gave me a heart attack. Thank goodness I acted quickly and put it out. Buyer beware! Learn from my mistake and never use this product after it has stopped making contact with electricity and the light shuts off when it’s still plugged in. Good luck!
customer_reviews.author: Berta

customer_reviews.title: The best of it is i dont have to spend money ...
customer_reviews.text: very user friendly. I use it with blue cerepil and i melts the whole tin (new tin full of wax) in 45 minutes after that i put it on medium setting and thats it, i start to wax. The best of it is i dont have to spend money every 3 weeks at the salon to get my female mustache waxed :D so i think this warmer and cerepil wax are a very good investment
customer_reviews.author: Is m j

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but, waxing isn't for me!
customer_reviews.text: I had decided to try and wax myself, because I spend way too much money going to the salon. This warmer works well. However its a waste of money for me because I am not very good at waxing myself. I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Corley

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: The wax can sits in the unit and if you scoop wax out carefully there shouldn't be anything to clean.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t melt
customer_reviews.text: Love this wax warmer. I’ve forgotten and left it on for nearly 12 hours and it was completely fine. Quality.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT heat up
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT work! Does NOT heat up at all! Worst part is, they don’t have a return policy! Now I’m at a loss!
customer_reviews.author: tania M.

customer_reviews.title: Works okay...
customer_reviews.text: This wax warmer does the job but I feel like it takes about a hour for my wax to completely melt... I have used this product n a different wax warmer and it melted in half the time. I probably won't buy this wax warmer again but it gets the job done. Once it's hot it stay hot for a long period of time. Good use for someone to use at home though.. Wouldn't recommend for a salon.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t bring the little cup to put the wax in- have to buy that separately. The heat settings work well and the warmer itself has lasted me over a year so far. It’s been working well - would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Colon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this wax warmer! If you're doing anything other than facial waxing and you'll have the lid off for a long period of time you have to play around with the heat settings, but nothing major.
